'''''Scaling the Scorching Sacred Mountain (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all '''36''' [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]].

Some Teleport Waypoints can only be accessed upon progressing certain World Quests and exploration, including the following:{{Verify|any others?}}
* {{Quest|The Mystery of Tecoloapan Beach}}
* [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Stoking the Ancient Flames]]''
